metadata.title: DiffSheets - Compare Excel & CSV Files Online
metadata.description: Free online tool to compare Excel files, CSV spreadsheets, and more. 100% client-side, your data never leaves your browser.

upload.title: Compare Excel files and spreadsheets
upload.subtitle: Upload two files to see the differences. Your data stays in your browser.

offline.title: 100% Offline
offline.description: Your data never leaves your browser. All processing happens locally.

formats.title: Multiple Formats
formats.description: Support for Excel (xlsx, xls), CSV, and ODS files.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Handle spreadsheets with thousands of rows efficiently.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.description: Free and open source. No sign-up required.

free.question: Is DiffSheets free to use?
free.answer: Yes, DiffSheets is completely free to use. There are no hidden fees, subscriptions, or premium features locked behind a paywall.

safe.question: Is my data safe when using DiffSheets?
safe.answer: Absolutely. DiffSheets processes all files 100% client-side in your browser. Your spreadsheet data never leaves your computer or gets uploaded to any server.

formats.question: What file formats does DiffSheets support?
formats.answer: DiffSheets supports Excel files (.xlsx, .xls), CSV files, and OpenDocument Spreadsheets (.ods). You can compare files of the same or different formats.

large.question: Can I compare large Excel files?
large.answer: Yes, DiffSheets uses virtual scrolling technology to efficiently handle large spreadsheets with thousands of rows without performance issues.

how.question: How does DiffSheets compare spreadsheets?
how.answer: DiffSheets offers multiple comparison modes: position-based matching (row by row), key column matching (by a unique identifier), and intelligent LCS algorithm for best alignment detection.

excel.title: Compare Excel Files Online - Free XLSX & XLS Diff Tool
excel.description: Compare two Excel files instantly. Find differences between XLSX and XLS spreadsheets with our free online tool. No upload required - 100% private.
excel.subtitle: Find every difference between two Excel spreadsheets in seconds. Free, private, and works entirely in your browser.

benefits.title: Why Use DiffSheets for Excel Comparison?

visual.title: Visual Side-by-Side Comparison
visual.description: See changes highlighted in color. Added rows in green, deleted in red, modified in yellow.

privacy.title: Complete Privacy
privacy.description: Your Excel files never leave your computer. All processing happens locally in your browser.

formats.title: All Excel Formats
formats.description: Works with .xlsx, .xls, and even compare Excel to CSV files.

free.title: 100% Free
free.description: No registration, no limits, no watermarks. Use it as much as you need.

audit.title: Financial Auditing
audit.description: Compare budget versions, track changes in financial reports, audit expense sheets.

version.title: Version Control
version.description: Track changes between document versions when collaborating with teams.

migration.title: Data Migration
migration.description: Verify data integrity after importing or exporting between systems.

qa.title: Quality Assurance
qa.description: Validate test results, compare expected vs actual outputs.

csv.title: CSV Diff Tool - Compare CSV Files Online Free
csv.description: Compare two CSV files online for free. Find differences between CSV spreadsheets instantly. No upload to servers - your data stays private.
csv.subtitle: The fastest way to find differences between CSV files. Free, secure, and runs entirely in your browser.

benefits.title: Why Use DiffSheets for CSV Comparison?

instant.title: Instant Results
instant.description: Compare CSV files in milliseconds. No waiting for server processing.

large.title: Handle Large Files
large.description: Virtual scrolling lets you compare CSV files with hundreds of thousands of rows.

delimiters.title: Smart Parsing
delimiters.description: Automatically detects delimiters. Works with comma, semicolon, tab-separated files.

export.title: Compare Across Formats
export.description: Compare CSV to Excel, or CSV to CSV. Mix and match file types.

database.title: Database Exports
database.description: Compare database dumps, verify backup integrity, track schema changes.

api.title: API Responses
api.description: Diff API response data, compare test results, validate integrations.

logs.title: Log Analysis
logs.description: Compare log files, find configuration differences, track changes over time.

etl.title: ETL Pipelines
etl.description: Validate data transformations, verify ETL output, ensure data quality.

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Tips, tutorials, and updates about spreadsheet comparison

how-to-compare-excel.title: How to Compare Two Excel Files: 5 Easy Methods
how-to-compare-excel.excerpt: Learn the best ways to compare Excel spreadsheets, from manual methods to automated tools like DiffSheets.

excel-diff-formula.title: Excel VLOOKUP vs Diff Tools: Which is Better?
excel-diff-formula.excerpt: When should you use Excel formulas vs dedicated comparison tools? We break down the pros and cons.

footer.privacy: Your files are processed locally and never uploaded to any server.
